channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy Digital Downloads – Simple eCommerce for Selling Digital Files
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Digital Downloads – Simple eCommerce for Selling Digital Files

item.title: CVE-2022-2387|2024-08-03T00:39:06.976Z -- unknown -- easy%20digital%20downloads%20%E2%80%93%20simple%20ecommerce%20for%20selling%20digital%20files
item.description: The Easy Digital Downloads WordPress plugin before 3.0 does not have CSRF check in place when deleting payment history, and does not ensure that the post to be deleted is actually a payment history. As a result, attackers could make a logged in admin delete arbitrary post via a CSRF attack
